::Dion::





Dion shakes his head at Grimlock's comment. "Those of us who need others to envy their skills need to get a hobby."

Dion watches the Decepticons start to run after taking some heavy firepower, looking around the sky, trying to spot any more Decepticons (I lost track of which ones were still there).









--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:


> --- Pacifix & Autobots ---


> 


> Pacifix nods, not entirely understanding what Axalon (lol, should I 


> know about what Axalon is? If so ignore that little bit about not 


> understanding =P) was and makes a mental note to question Torca 


> later about his origins. "Ahh, I see. That reminds me, where are 


> Firedrill, Beachcomber, and your friend Klant now? I'm looking 


> forward to seeing them again, and to meet Klant." He smiles, and 


> stops for a second, "Hold on for a moment." He pulls back a little, 


> and opens a commlink to all Autobots in the vicinity, "This is 


> Pacifix, are there any autobots who I didn't give orders to?(hehe, 


> there's always the possibility of some profiles not being on the 


> page)." He steps back to talk to Torca, "Well, I'd better point out 


> my crew." He turns around to faces the Autobots. Pacifix 


> commences to explain who each bot is because rAuq is too lazy 


> and tired to make a long and extensive post to do something 


> menial. =P


> 


> Scattershot nods as his name is called, and makes a short wave 


> to Torca. Nosecone bows following Scattershot's wave, and 


> Afterburner whips around doing a donut, and spraying dirt on 


> Scattershot's legs. He revs his engine as his name is called.


> 


> Crossroads saluts and smiles at Torca.


> 


> Pacifix points out JetV and Artemis who are going on a recon 


> mission presently.


> 


> OOc: I'm one tired little boy, and that little pillow on my be is 


> looking mighty inviting rig-- Zzzzzzzzzzzz....


> 


> 


> On 25 Jul 2001, at 18:49, Alloran2@a... wrote:


> 


> > :::Torca:::


> > 


> > Torca: No, actually.  I came to Earth on an ejected stasis pod from


> > the Axalon.  I awoke and joined the Maximals here, but they do not


> > have good leadership, so my friend Klant and i left with Cliffjumper,


> > Firedrill, and Beachcomber.


> >
